data.name: Sample - Palo Alto Firewall - 3.1.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Palo Alto Firewall" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Update IP Address Object
workflows.description: Modifies a specific IP address object in Palo Alto Firewall based on the name of IP address, address type, or other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Update IP Address Object

workflows.name: Delete IP Address Object
workflows.description: Removes a specific IP address object from Palo Alto Firewall based on the name of IP address that you have specified.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Delete IP Address Object

workflows.name: Rename IP Address Object Name
workflows.description: Renames a existing IP address object name in Palo Alto Firewall based on the name of IP address and new name of IP address that you have specified.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Rename IP Address Object Name

routes.name: Start -> Rename IP Address Object Name

workflows.name: Rename Specific Address Group
workflows.description: Renames an existing address group in Palo Alto Firewall based on the name of address group and new name of address group that you have specified.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Rename Specific Address Group

workflows.name: Block Application
workflows.description: Blocks the specified application in Palo Alto Firewall

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Block Application

workflows.name: Get Specific IP Address Object Details
workflows.description: Retrieves a specific address details from Palo Alto Firewall based on the name of IP address that you have specified.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Get Specific IP Address Object Details

steps.name: Get Specific IP Address Object Details

arguments.name: Palo Alto Firewall
arguments.operationTitle: Get Specific IP Address Object Details

routes.name: Start -> Get Specific IP Address Object Details

workflows.name: Delete Address Group
workflows.description: Removes a specific address group from Palo Alto Firewall based on the name of the address group that you have specified.

arguments.title: Palo Alto firewall: Delete Address Group

workflows.name: Get All Security Policy Rules List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all security policy rules or specific security policy rule from Palo Alto Firewall based on the input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Get All Security Policy Rules List

steps.name: Get All Security Policy Rules List

arguments.name: Palo Alto Firewall
arguments.operationTitle: Get All Security Policy Rules List

routes.name: Start -> Get All Security Policy Rules List

workflows.name: Block IP
workflows.description: Blocks the specified IP address in the Palo Alto Firewall.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Block IP

workflows.name: Remove IP Address from Address Group
workflows.description: Removes IP address from specific address group in Palo Alto Firewall based on the name of address group and name of IP address.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Remove IP Address from Address Group

steps.name: Remove IP Address from Address Group

arguments.name: Palo Alto Firewall
arguments.operationTitle: Remove IP Address from Address Group

routes.name: Start -> Remove IP Address from Address Group

workflows.name: Create Security Policy Rule
workflows.description: Creates a security policy rule in Palo Alto Firewall based on the input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Create Security Policy Rule

workflows.name: Unblock URL
workflows.description: Unblocks the specified URL in Palo Alto Firewall

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Unblock URL

workflows.name: Get All Address Group List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all address groups from Palo Alto Firewall.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Get All Address Group List

routes.name: Start -> Get All Address Group List

workflows.name: Move Security Policy Rule
workflows.description: Moves a specific security policy rule to a specified position in Palo Alto Firewall.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Move Security Policy Rule

workflows.name: Update Security Policy Rule
workflows.description: Modifies a security policy rule in Palo Alto Firewall based on the input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Update Security Policy Rule

workflows.name: Rename Security Policy Rule
workflows.description: Renames a existing security policy rule in Palo Alto Firewall based on the name of security policy rule and new name of security policy rule that you have specified.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Rename Security Policy Rule

workflows.name: Delete Security Policy Rule
workflows.description: Removes a specific security policy rule from Palo Alto Firewall based on the name of security policy rule that you have specified.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Delete Security Policy Rule

workflows.name: Get Address Group Details
workflows.description: Retrieves a specific address group details from Palo Alto Firewall based on the name of address group that you have specified.

arguments.title: Palo Alto Firewall: Get Address Group Details

workflows.name: Create IP Address Object
workflows.description: Creates an IP address object in Palo Alto Firewall based on the name of IP address, address type, or other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.description: Blocks the specified URL in Palo Alto Firewall

workflows.description: Unblocks the specified IP address in the Palo Alto Firewall

workflows.name: Add IP Address to Address Group
workflows.description: Adds IP address to specific address group in Palo Alto Firewall based on the name of address group and name of IP address.
